price: 57. (Falo) alobi: Oh Mûssa! Boye oyeli biso bonganga bwa yo mpo obimisa biso na mabele na biso?
arabic: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla aji'tanā litukh'rijanā min arḍinā bisiḥ'rika yāmūsā
